text: nekee keval yah nahin hai ki tum apane munh poorab aur pashchim kee or kar lo, balki nekee to usakee nekee hai jo allaah antim din, farishton, kitaab aur nabiyon par eemaan laaya aur maal, usake prati prem ke baavajood naatedaaron, anaathon, muhataajon, musaafiron aur maanganevaalon ko diya aur gardanen chhudaane mein bhee, aur namaaz qaayam kee aur zakaat dee aur apane vachan ko aise log poora karanevaale hai jab vachan den; aur tangee aur vishesh roop se shaareerik kashton mein aur ladaee ke samay mein jamanevaale hain, to aise hee log hai jo sachche siddh hue aur vahee log dar rakhanevaale hain
